snippet: Repairs have ended the Pisa tower’s status as the most leaning, and a small tower in Germany is the new Guinness titleholder, but rivals have emerged.
abstract: St Moritz Journal; repairs to the famed leaning tower of Pisa have ended its status as the farthest leaning tower; small tower in Germany is the new Guinness titleholder, but rivals have emerged; some say the tower of St Mauritius in St Moritz, Switzerland, holds the real claim to the title.
lead_paragraph: Repairs have ended the Pisa tower’s status as the most leaning, and a small tower in Germany is the new Guinness titleholder, but rivals have emerged.

headline.seo: With Leaning Tower of Pisa Straighter, Other Contenders
headline.main: With Pisa’s Tower Straighter, Others Vie for Title
headline.print_headline: With Pisa’s Tower Straighter, Others Vie for Title
